WRITING.TITLE: American Crime seasons 1 and 2 are now on Netflix (at least in Canada)!
WRITING.TEXT: I just saw American Crime in the 'recently added' section on Netflix. I live in Canada but I imagine it'd be in some other countries too. Maybe I'll rewatch it before season 3!
I thought this was being reposted on me_irl for the fifth time.
Ya that'd be good thanks.
Ya I'm fine now. Originally when I posted I was very upset and suicidal. Feeling a little better today but not much.
*40 hours

Jay Landsman in the Wire is pretty funny.
And the X-files in general has a good sense of humour.
lol me too. I even posted about it like a week back. We could be meme friends!
/r/everyonewhotalkstome_irl
You beat me too it, big boy.
I couldn't think of what to say to you. I'm so nervous. I luv u plz notis me!

This is the third meme of this kind I've seen. Is there like a website that types like that or something?
[First two](http://m.imgur.com/a/FYLJr)
I've seen this meme so many times. Every time it's like the first time.
Lol ya.
I think I'm fine now. I just shitpost when I'm mentally unstable.
Bad night, but ya.
I worked really hard for that role. I'm glad you appreciate it.
lol.
Literally me.

This text is so fucking fake because I have no friends and every friend I have ever had hated me so much (because I'm an awful human being) that they'd come and say this shit to my face, not over text.
But the themes behind this post (themes like me wanting to die, me joking about it in texting slang, me really wanting to fucking kill myself) are so fucking true you don't even understand.
Why am I like this!!!!!???? Why won't it end!!!!???? Why won't Rachel MdAdams let me have sex with her????!!!!! I've seen everything she's been in except Everything Will Be Fine, and the tv shows she's cameoed in!!!!!
Plz help lmao!
Rachel please notice me!
The only thing I didn't already know was the fake lines bit.
Sorry I meant kids shows. I should've said in the title. I've already heard a lot about how great Bojack is.

Ming-Na Wen is playing a high-level time-travel agent,
I didn't know this show was gonna be like that. But I'm glad it is.
I wasn't there for it when it first came out either. But a lot of people seem to like it so I'm sure the show will get tons of attention when season 2 arrives.
Thanks dude. I was wondering when in October it would premiere.

Every time I see this meme I think it's Spock going up to Kirk because of the shirt colours.
Edit: now that I look more carefully I realize it doesn't look at all like Star Trek. I'm wrong please don't hate me.
The dad's reply reminded me of John Oliver during LWT. When his jokes end in yelling.
Both.
So Long and Thanks for All the Fish, the fourth book in the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy series.
Ya it was.
The X-files is my favourite.
The full episodes are free on the CBC website.

Is this the long awaited sequel to the [Pikachu on the Bus](http://m.imgur.com/eeK44uj) meme?
Edit: apparently Pikachu is on a train. Sorry boys!

Man this is so me. Not very often do I see something that is so me on me_irl! It's this and that sponge bob meme where he's kinda tinted red and he's like "when you feel yourself being annoying but you can't stop".

Man I fuckin wish this shit worked. I have forks and outlets! It would be so easy. But I went on this suicide website and it said more than half the time you don't die from fork-in-outlet and it's usually really painful. So I'd rather not risk surviving. I think the best method would have to be a shotgun in the mouth. I think jumping in front of a train is good too.
I mean me too thanks.

None of this is me_irl
All of this is absolutelynotme_irl
I'd switch with some dead celebrity. Because 1) id be dead and 2) people would think fondly off me. Those are the only 2 things I've ever really wanted in my life.

Me: damn that's impressive!
Commentator: he didn't stack that 9th box right, what a TRAGIC mistake for this pizza box folder!
Someone taking interest in something I've done? Wow! there's a first time for everything! Thanks dude.

[I failed](http://m.imgur.com/7KzJQD1) but I was doing it ironically anyways!
Seriously though I think I need help. Thanks to all the random internet people for making me feel a tiny bit better!

If you go to the [List of programs broadcast by HBO](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_programs_broadcast_by_HBO) Wikipedia page it lists a Watchmen show as "in development". As far as I can tell there is no word on who is involved at all. Hopefully it turns out being made and more importantly being made well!
Thanks to /u/MicroChango! His shitpost post inspired me to make my depression into a shitpost!

WRITING.TITLE: 2meirl4meirl
WRITING.TEXT:
~~Why did the chicken cross the road?~~
Why did /u/subject6620 kill himself?
~~To end its miserable life of depression and anxiety~~
Because despite living a pretty damn good and privileged life in a first world country he still felt empty inside and became so depressed he decided to end it on August 15th 2016.
If I survive I can always say I was just doing it ironically so it's cool!

I think it's to close to the movies. I think it's only 4 or 5 years after the movies came out. Reboots don't usually happen that fast.
Unless you mean a tv show just in the HP universe. Then I have no idea.

This isn't what memes are for. They're for depression and ironically saying you're gonna kill yourself but not really that ironic because you kinda consider it a lot.
This is not dank.
Currently 16. Suck at video games. Don't even play them. Just watch TV and browse memes and sometimes read just because I feel guilty for never reading anymore.

No mention of other Phineas and Ferb songs? [Squirrels in My Pants](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=OID7gA8fcaw) is a classic. And so is [Ain't Go Rhythm](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=6Oj79WGfQec). And I've always liked the short song [Moon Farm](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=OW4802HITYI).
Well I also slobber over BC and praise all of his movies. So that explains it.
I actually liked the Imitation Game. Usually I agree with John on his movie jokes. Not this time.
Aw thanks! I always like hearing from fans!

I'm not good at hiding my emotions. When someone guesses something right in a show I'm usually like "oh maybe" in a way that makes it obvious that they are right. I almost ruined Breaking Bad for my friend one time. I would've never forgiven myself.
Honestly it's got to the point where I value a meme more than a gorilla's life. Fucken kill it so I can have more memes to feed my addiction.
That is literally me_irl!
You can't get away with saying that around here.
That actually sounds great. I have no idea what your talking about. The premise is what made me wanna watch the show.
Amy Parks!

I've been watching it. It's pretty good. The main actress is great and so is Keith David. The teenage daughter seems more realistic than most teenagers in shows.
The only major problem is that it seems a little slow and sometimes really boring. It's taking 13 episodes to tell a 10 episode story.
One of the best parts about this show is the setting. I've never seen a show set in a megachurch before. The interesting setting makes it a little more than just another family drama.

Ya me too. I read it as 'him hanging himself' without even thinking just because I'm so used to seeing the words 'hanging' and 'himself' next to each other. Then I thought about it and I realized there couldn't have been a video of that. So I read the comment again and I was like, 'oh ok, fish memes are pretty cool too.'
I mean me too thanks.

I'm about to watch it because the trailer looked cool and it has some good reviews so far but a 93 minute first episode is kinda off-putting. If the shows good then it shouldn't matter but 93 minutes feels like a long time.
I've never liked movie-length episodes. TV is great because it's in short(ish) bursts.
Edit: It's funny that Jaden Smith's character says stuff like "Constellations tell a story." And everyone calls him a weirdo.
Me rn

Haha this is funny.
Edit: I fucked up bad. I'm so sorry.

Torture? I hardly knew her!

Still good to have it all in a list like that.
I smiled a little. It's not that bad. I definitely couldn't have thought of it.
